subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Steroids
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: After a wave of doping scandals, the International Cycling Union has agreed to let a laboratory create biological records of its top riders in yet another effort to catch cheats.
snippet: After a wave of doping scandals, the International Cycling Union has agreed to let a laboratory create biological records of its top riders in yet another effort to catch cheats.
